row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 11)
row_desc: Queen has two lip sync wins.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
